Troper Settings Search Random Favorites Read-Later Settings About Recently Read Open Drawer Close Drawer Close Tab Open Tabs Loading Parsing Connecting Refresh
Display Settings Tab Settings Open All Links in New Tab Move To New Tab Automatically move to newly opened tabs Lock Rotation Night Mode Display articles with a dark background for easier reading in the dark Enable to prevent your screen from rotating.\nDisable to use device\'s global settings. Prevent Sleep Enable to prevent your screen from shutting down while reading an article. Allow Zoom Using either gestures or the floating zoom buttons.\nThis does not reflow text as it used to, only zooms in and out like in the browser. Show Spoilers When enabled, spoilers will not be hidden Warn me Warns you if spoilers are not hidden Recently Read Spoilers Highlight revealed spoilers Even when spoilers are shown, they will still be highlighted No. of items to save Clear History Currently in list: Advanced Settings Connection Timeout (in seconds) List cleared! Are you sure? Are you sure you want to clear search suggestions? Are you sure you want to clear the recently read articles list? Suggestions cleared! Default Sort Method Currently in Favorites: Currently in \'Read-Later\' list: Clear Favorites Clear \'Read-Later\' list Are you sure you want to clear all your favorites? Are you sure you want to clear your \'Read-Later\' list? Are you sure you want to clear the cache?\nThis will not delete files saved offline manually or the favorites. Are you sure you want to clear all offline files? Favorites cleared! \'Read-Later\' list cleared! Tablet View Render pages with tablets in mind.\n Turn off if you get weird looking pictures and pages. Confirm before exiting Save open tabs (if any) before exiting Font Scale Decrease Font Size Cache Settings Allow Caching Current Cache Size: Clear Cache saved for offline reading. Offline Articles Delete all offline files Number of saved article: " Delete All
Open in new tab Add to Favorites Open in External Browser External Link Read Later
Evacuate? At our moment of triumph? Are you sure you want to quit Troper? I need a break! On second thought... Exit Sort Sort by Name Oldest First Newest First added to Favorites. added to \'Read-Later\' list. already in Favorites. already in \'Read-Later\' list. Your Favorites are empty! Your \'Read-Later\' list is empty! No files saved for offline reading! There are no items in your history! The list is empty! Find in Page Share... An unexpected error has occurred! Error! Connection Error! An error occurred trying to load the article! TVTropes may be down or you may not have an active internet connection.\n\nTry increasing the timeout in the application settings, or see if the site loads from an external browser. Retry Incoming Article There was a problem with the incoming article\'s URL. Never ask me again! Warning! Spoilers are not hidden!\nYou can change this in the app\'s Settings page. Save Offline Article saved for offline viewing. File loaded from cache.\nPull down to refresh! File loaded from storage.\nPull down to refresh! Days to keep cache: (0 for unlimited) days Unlimited
Search Settings Clear search suggestions Backup Settings to Storage Restore Settings from Backup Settings backed up successfully to: Failed to write to storage! Make sure it is available and not locked or full. An error occurred trying to backup application settings! Backup not found! Failed to write to settings! An error occurred trying to restore application settings! Settings will be saved to:
by Elad Avron Version build ...or click here to check out our brand new website! Click here to follow us on Twitter for all the latest updates! This application uses the following libraries: • jsoup-1.9.2 • joda-time 2.9.4 Changelog: Source code available at GitHub!
Check out this article on TvTropes! Check out this article on TvTropes: Sent using Troper - The Android TVTropes Reader! Share Article
\"Troper\" has been Updated! Version 2.9.2:\n • Fixed pages not loading.\n \n\n Keep in mind that I do have a full time day-job now so future updates might take longer. \n\n A more detailed update log can be found in the \"About\".\n Don\'t worry, this message only appears once per update! Settings
